short.es: Reducir el brillo de los anuncios en páginas web
short.fr: Diminuer la luminosité des annonces sur les pages web
short.id: Mengurangi kecerahan iklan di halaman web
short.it: Riduci la luminosità degli annunci sulle pagine web
short.nl: Verminder de helderheid van advertenties op webpagina's
short.pt_BR: Reduzir o brilho de anúncios em páginas da web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ad Dimmer - Your Ultimate Solution for a Less Distracting Web Experience

Tired of distracting ads cluttering your web pages? "Ad Dimmer" is here to help! Our innovative Chrome extension subtly greys out display ads, making them less prominent while preserving the integrity of the websites you visit. Enjoy a cleaner, more focused browsing experience without completely removing ads, supporting content creators in the process.

Key Features:

Greys Out Display Ads: Softly dims display ads on all web pages, reducing their visual impact.
Enhances Browsing Focus: Allows you to concentrate on the content that matters without being distracted by bright, flashy ads.

Supports Content Creators: 
By not completely blocking ads, you still support the websites and content creators you love.
Easy to Use: Simple installation and automatic activation on all websites. No complex settings or configurations required.

Improved Focus and Productivity:
Ads can be a major distraction, pulling your attention away from important content. By dimming ads, Ad Dimmer helps you stay focused on the task at hand, whether you're reading an article, researching a topic, or just browsing for fun.

Reduced Eye Strain:
Bright and flashy ads can cause eye strain, especially during long browsing sessions. Ad Dimmer's soft grey overlay on ads creates a more visually comfortable browsing environment, reducing eye fatigue.

Cleaner Aesthetic:
A cluttered web page can be overwhelming. Ad Dimmer enhances the aesthetic of web pages by toning down the intrusive elements, providing a cleaner and more pleasant browsing experience.

Supports Ethical Ad Practices:
Unlike traditional ad blockers that completely remove ads, Ad Dimmer allows ads to be displayed in a less obtrusive manner. This ensures that content creators and website owners still receive ad revenue, promoting a fair and sustainable internet ecosystem.

Seamless Integration:
Ad Dimmer works seamlessly in the background, automatically dimming ads as you browse. There's no need for manual intervention or constant adjustments, providing a hassle-free experience.
